summary: Zayora website - an orange-themed tech product website for bluetooth earbuds and smartwatches, founded by Yash Jaiswal. Features product showcase, partner logos (YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player, Blinkit), contact information, and coming soon section. Now includes e-commerce functionality with product listing, cash on delivery checkout, and delivery charges.
architectural_notes: Orange theme for tech product website
Product showcase for bluetooth earbuds and smartwatches
E-commerce functionality with product listing and pricing
Cash on delivery payment method only
Fixed delivery charge of ₹50 per order
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- White and light blue wireless earbuds with transparent charging case showing digital display, product photography style on neutral background (wireless-earbuds-white-blue.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create homepage layout with orange tech product theme featuring hero section, product showcase, partner logos section, and contact information footer
Add company information section displaying founder name 'Yash Jaiswal' and company name 'Zayora'
Create product showcase section featuring bluetooth earbuds and smartwatch with product images
Add partner logos section displaying YouTube logo, Bharat Ke Founder logo, and MX Player logo in full color
Add 'Coming Soon on Blinkit' section with Blinkit logo in color
Add contact information section displaying customer care number 9919031626 and email zayora11@gmail.com
Render all generated product images, partner logos, and brand assets as static files from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Add a third product to the product showcase featuring the white/light blue wireless earbuds from the uploaded image with MRP ₹499
Implement cash on delivery checkout system with delivery charge of ₹50
Fetch and display product listings from backend on the product showcase section
Render the uploaded white/light blue wireless earbuds product image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory

new_feature_requests.summary: Create orange-themed website layout for tech products
Add company info section with founder name (Yash Jaiswal)
Display product images for bluetooth earbuds and smartwatch
Add partner logos in color: YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player
Add Blinkit logo with 'Coming Soon on Blinkit' section
Add contact section with phone (9919031626) and email (zayora11@gmail.com)
Implement cash on delivery checkout system
Add delivery charge of ₹50 to checkout
Create backend data model for products with fields: id, name, description, image path, MRP, features array, and availability status
Create order management system in backend to store customer orders with product details, delivery address, phone number, and order status
